name: Kung Fu Games - Super Hero Hitting Battle
name_original: Kung Fu Games - Super Hero Hitting Battle
description:
AWESOME 3D action & hitter game in Fighting Hero style! Let's free to unlock our all companions!!!!
Let Fighting Hero destroy all of you enemy and discover all EPIC BOSTREETFIGHTS!!!
##GAME FEATURES##
- Against these 100+ unique monsters.
- Unleash super moves for Kill them all.
- Heroes with cool weapons to make your lover exciting challenge.
- Practice and speed of the finger to get high scores
- Play without using the Internet.

So what are you waiting for
PUNCH IT NOW!!!
